SELECT FIXED_DATE FROM
(SELECT FIXED_DATE , ROWNUM FROM (SELECT DISTINCT FIXED_DATE FROM STAY_POPULATION_TB) ORDER BY FIXED_DATE DESC) WHERE
ROWNUM < 5
(SELECT FIXED_DATE , ROWNUM FROM (SELECT DISTINCT FIXED_DATE FROM FLOAT_POPULATION_TB) ORDER BY FIXED_DATE DESC) WHERE
ROWNUM < 5
(SELECT FIXED_DATE , ROWNUM FROM (SELECT DISTINCT FIXED_DATE FROM WORKER_POPULATION_TB) ORDER BY FIXED_DATE DESC) WHERE
ROWNUM < 5

SELECT SUM(SPOP) AS ALLPOP1, SUM(CASE WHEN AGE = 10 THEN SPOP ELSE 0 END) AS AGEPOP10, SUM(CASE WHEN AGE = 20 THEN SPOP ELSE 0 END) AS AGEPOP20, SUM(CASE WHEN AGE = 30 THEN SPOP ELSE 0 END) AS AGEPOP30, SUM(CASE WHEN AGE = 40 THEN SPOP ELSE 0 END) AS AGEPOP40, SUM(CASE WHEN AGE = 50 THEN SPOP ELSE 0 END) AS AGEPOP50, SUM(CASE WHEN AGE = 60 THEN SPOP ELSE 0 END) AS AGEPOP60, SUM(CASE WHEN GENDER = 0 THEN SPOP ELSE 0 END) AS MANPOP, SUM(CASE WHEN GENDER = 1 THEN SPOP ELSE 0 END) AS WOMANPOP FROM STAY_POPULATION_TB WHERE TO_CHAR(FIXED_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') = #{fixed_date} AND SIGUNGU_CD = #{sigungu_cd};

SELECT DISTINCT (SELECT SUM(WPOP) FROM WORKER_POPULATION_TB WHERE TO_CHAR(FIXED_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') = #{fixed_date} AND SIGUNGU_CD = #{sigungu_cd}) ALLPOP1, (SELECT SUM(WPOP) FROM WORKER_POPULATION_TB WHERE AGE = 10 AND TO_CHAR(FIXED_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') = #{fixed_date} AND SIGUNGU_CD = #{sigungu_cd}) AGEPOP10, (SELECT SUM(WPOP) FROM WORKER_POPULATION_TB WHERE AGE = 20 AND TO_CHAR(FIXED_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') = #{fixed_date} AND SIGUNGU_CD = #{sigungu_cd}) AGEPOP20, (SELECT SUM(WPOP) FROM WORKER_POPULATION_TB WHERE AGE = 30 AND TO_CHAR(FIXED_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') = #{fixed_date} AND SIGUNGU_CD = #{sigungu_cd}) AGEPOP30, (SELECT SUM(WPOP) FROM WORKER_POPULATION_TB WHERE AGE = 40 AND TO_CHAR(FIXED_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') = #{fixed_date} AND SIGUNGU_CD = #{sigungu_cd}) AGEPOP40, (SELECT SUM(WPOP) FROM WORKER_POPULATION_TB WHERE AGE = 50 AND TO_CHAR(FIXED_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') = #{fixed_date} AND SIGUNGU_CD = #{sigungu_cd}) AGEPOP50, (SELECT SUM(WPOP) FROM WORKER_POPULATION_TB WHERE AGE = 60 AND TO_CHAR(FIXED_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') = #{fixed_date} AND SIGUNGU_CD = #{sigungu_cd}) AGEPOP60, (SELECT SUM(WPOP) FROM WORKER_POPULATION_TB WHERE GENDER = 0 AND TO_CHAR(FIXED_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') = #{fixed_date} AND SIGUNGU_CD = #{sigungu_cd}) MANPOP, (SELECT SUM(WPOP) FROM WORKER_POPULATION_TB WHERE GENDER = 1 AND TO_CHAR(FIXED_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') = #{fixed_date} AND SIGUNGU_CD = #{sigungu_cd}) WOMANPOP FROM WORKER_POPULATION_TB WHERE SIGUNGU_CD = #{sigungu_cd}

SELECT SUM(fpop) AS allpop1, SUM(CASE WHEN gender = 0 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS manpop, SUM(CASE WHEN gender = 1 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS womanpop, SUM(CASE WHEN age = 10 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS agepop10, SUM(CASE WHEN age = 20 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS agepop20, SUM(CASE WHEN age = 30 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS agepop30, SUM(CASE WHEN age = 40 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS agepop40, SUM(CASE WHEN age = 50 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS agepop50, SUM(CASE WHEN age = 60 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS agepop60, SUM(CASE WHEN timeline = 1 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS timepop1, SUM(CASE WHEN timeline = 2 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS timepop2, SUM(CASE WHEN timeline = 3 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS timepop3, SUM(CASE WHEN timeline = 4 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS timepop4, SUM(CASE WHEN timeline = 5 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS timepop5, SUM(CASE WHEN timeline = 6 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS timepop6, SUM(CASE WHEN week IN (1,2,3,4,5) THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS onweekpop, SUM(CASE WHEN week IN (0,6) THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS weekendpop, SUM(CASE WHEN week = 1 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS monpop, SUM(CASE WHEN week = 2 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS tuepop, SUM(CASE WHEN week = 3 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS wedpop, SUM(CASE WHEN week = 4 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS thrpop, SUM(CASE WHEN week = 5 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS fripop, SUM(CASE WHEN week = 6 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS satpop, SUM(CASE WHEN week = 0 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS sunpop FROM FLOAT_POPULATION_TB WHERE FIXED_DATE = TO_TIMESTAMP(#{fixedDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND SIGUNGUCD = #{sigunguCd}

SELECT SUM(fpop) AS allpop1, SUM(CASE WHEN gender = 0 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS manpop, SUM(CASE WHEN gender = 1 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS womanpop, SUM(CASE WHEN age = 10 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS agepop10, SUM(CASE WHEN age = 20 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS agepop20, SUM(CASE WHEN age = 30 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS agepop30, SUM(CASE WHEN age = 40 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS agepop40, SUM(CASE WHEN age = 50 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS agepop50, SUM(CASE WHEN age = 60 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS agepop60, SUM(CASE WHEN timeline = 1 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS timepop1, SUM(CASE WHEN timeline = 2 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS timepop2, SUM(CASE WHEN timeline = 3 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS timepop3, SUM(CASE WHEN timeline = 4 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS timepop4, SUM(CASE WHEN timeline = 5 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS timepop5, SUM(CASE WHEN timeline = 6 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS timepop6, SUM(CASE WHEN week IN (1,2,3,4,5) THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS onweekpop, SUM(CASE WHEN week IN (0,6) THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS weekendpop, SUM(CASE WHEN week = 1 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS monpop, SUM(CASE WHEN week = 2 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS tuepop, SUM(CASE WHEN week = 3 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS wedpop, SUM(CASE WHEN week = 4 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS thrpop, SUM(CASE WHEN week = 5 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS fripop, SUM(CASE WHEN week = 6 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS satpop, SUM(CASE WHEN week = 0 THEN fpop ELSE 0 END) AS sunpop FROM FLOAT_POPULATION_TB2 WHERE FIXED_DATE = TO_TIMESTAMP(#{fixed_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND WGSX BETWEEN (#{wgsx} - 0.0025) AND (#{wgsx} + 0.0025) AND WGSY BETWEEN (#{wgsy} - 0.0025) AND (#{wgsy} + 0.0025);
